Yes, there is indeed an events page. But I am unable to update the site 
untill sunday or monday. KSLawdogg is politely keeping track of the bots he 
mercylessly butchered for me, so hopefully I'll get all the dead bots to 
where they belong.

::Rex/Firearm::

Rex and Firearm fly on their way toward Savanna's last reported position, 
scanning the ground for anything suspicious.

"Is that supposed to be there?" Firearm asks, pointing at a path through the 
woods, one that was rapidly becoming longer. Rex narrows his eyes, checking 
his scanners.

"Nope! That's not a Maximal signature either."

Firearm nods. "Let's get 'em."

The two Maximals change course to fly overhead the three bounty hunters. 
Firearm looks down at the bots, turning his head at a growl from Rex.

"Hot Rod's up ahead," Rex says, "He's being carried by another Maximal, along 
with someone else... Someone dead, as the scanners report."

Firearm narrows his eyes. "These three are going to be sorry."

He slowly loses altitude, setting the cannon on his arm to flamethrower, and 
firing a continous stream down at Improsoner and co.

Rex pulls out his missile launcher, firing a shot at Imprisoner.
